title: Dionysii Halicarnasei Quae Exstant, Volumen Quintum
Opsuculorum, Volumen Prius
monogr.author: Dionysius of Halicarnassus

quote.#text:
*deina/rxois d' e)netu/xomen te/ttarsin:
w(=n e)stin o(\ me\n e)k tw=n r(hto/rwn tw=n *)attikw=n, o(\ de\
ta\s peri\ *krh/thn sunagh/oxe muqologi/as, o(\ de\ presbu/teros
me\n a)mfoi=n tou/toin, *dh/lios de\ to\ ge/nos, pepragmateume/nos
tou=to me\n e)/pos, tou=to de\ pra/gmata,
te/tartos de\ o( peri\ *(omh/rou lo/gon sunteqeikw/s. e)qe/lw
de\ pro\s me/ros peri\ e(ka/stou dielqei=n, kai\ prw=ton peri\
tou= r(h/toros. e)/sti toi/nun ou(=tos kata/ ge th\n e)mh\n
do/can ou)de\n a)polei/pwn th=s *(uperei/dou xa/ritos, w(/st'
ei)pei=n: kai\ nu/ ken h)\ pare/lassen. e)nqu/mhma ga\r fe/rei
peistiko\n kai\ sxh=ma pantodapo/n, piqano/thto/s ge 
mh\n ou(/tws eu)= h(/kei, w(/ste parista/nein toi=s a)kou/ousi,
mh\ a)/llws gegone/nai to\ pra=gma h)\ w(s au)to\s le/gei. kai\
nomi/seien a)/n tis eu)h/qeis ei)=nai tou\s u(polabo/ntas to\n
lo/gon to\n kata\ *dhmosqe/nous ei)=nai tou/tou: polu\ ga\r
a)pe/xei tou= xarakth=ros. a)ll' o(/mws tosou=ton sko/tous

e)pipepo/laken, w(/ste tou\s me\n a)/llous au)tou= lo/gous
sxedo/n pou u(pe\r e(ch/konta kai\ e(kato\n o)/ntas 
a)gnoei=n sumbe/bhke, to\n de\ mh\ grafe/nta u(p' au)tou=
mo/non e)kei/nou nomi/zesqai. h( de\ le/cis e)sti\ tou= *deina/rxou
kuri/ws h)qikh/, pa/qos kinou=sa, sxedo\n th=| pikri/a| 
mo/non kai\ tw=| to/nw| tou= *dhmosqenikou= xarakth=ros
leipome/nh, tou= de\ piqanou= kai\ kuri/ou mhde\n e)nde/ousa.

p.#text:
peri\ *deina/rxou tou= r(h/toros ou)de\n ei)rhkw\s e)n
toi=s peri\ tw=n a)rxai/wn grafei=sin dia\ to\ mh/te eu(reth\n
i)di/ou gegone/nai xarakth=ros to\n a)/ndra, w(/sper to\n
*lusi/an kai\ to\n *)isokra/thn kai\ to\n *)isai=on, mh/te tw=n
eu(rhme/nwn e(te/rois teleiwth/n, w(/sper to\n *dhmosqe/nh 
kai\ to\n *ai)sxi/nh kai\  *(uperei/dhn h(mei=s kri/nomen,
o(rw=n de\ kai\ tou=ton to\n a)/ndra para\ polloi=s h)ciwme/non
o)no/matos e)pi\ deino/thti lo/gwn kai\ a)poleloipo/ta
dhmosi/ous te kai\ i)di/ous lo/gous ou)/te o)li/gous ou)/t' eu)katafronh/tous,
h(ghsa/mhn dei=n mh\ paralipei=n au)to/n, 
a)lla\ kai\ peri\ tou= bi/ou kai\ tou= xarakth=ros au)tou=
dielqei=n kai\ diori/sai tou/s te gnhsi/ous kai\ yeudei=s
lo/gous pa/ntwn h)\ tw=n ge plei/stwn a)nagkaio/teron oi)=mai
toi=s mh\ e)k perizw/matos a)skou=si r(htorikh/n. a(/ma de\
o(rw=n ou)de\n a)kribe\s ou)/te *kalli/maxon ou)/te tou\s e)k 
*perga/mou grammatikou\s peri\ au)tou= gra/yantas, a)lla\
para\ to\ mhde\n e)ceta/sai peri\ au)tou= tw=n a)kribeste/rwn
h(marthko/tas, w(s mh\ mo/non e)yeu=sqai polla\ a)lla\ kai\
lo/gous tou\s ou)de\n me\n au)tw=| prosh/kontas w(s *deina/rxou

tou/tw| prosti/qesqai, tou\s d' u(p' au)tou= grafe/ntas
e(te/rwn ei)=nai le/gein: a)lla\ *dhmh/trios o( *ma/gnhs, 
o(\s e)/doce gene/sqai polui(/stwr, e)n th=| peri\ tw=n o(mwnu/mwn
pragmatei/a| le/gwn kai\ peri\ tou/tou tou= a)ndro\s
kai\ u(po/lhyin parasxw/n, w(s peri\ au)tou= le/cwn ti a)kribe/s,
dieyeu/sqh th=s do/chs. ou)qe\n de\ kwlu/ei kai\ ta\s
le/ceis paraqe/sqai tou= a)ndro/s. e)/sti de\ ta\ u(p' au)tou=
grafe/nta ta/de:

e)k tou/twn ou)de\n e)/stin ou)/te a)kribe\s a)ll' ou)de\ a)lhqe\s 
eu(rei=n: ou)/te ga\r ge/nos ta)ndro\s ou)/te xro/nous, 
kaq' ou(\s h)=n, ou)/te to/pon, e)n w(=| die/triye, dedh/lwken,
o)no/mata  de\ mo/non koina\ kai\ peritre/xonta e)spou/dase
kai\ plh=qos lo/gwn ei)=pen ou)deni\ tw=n  su/mfwnon.
e)/dei de\ tou)nanti/on. a(\ ou)=n e)gw\ au)to\s di' e)mautou=
katelabo/mhn, tau=t' e)sti/n: *dei/narxos o( r(h/twr ui(o\s me\n 
h)=n *swstra/tou, *kori/nqios de\ to\ ge/nos, a)fiko/menos de\
ei)s *)aqh/nas, kaq' o(\n xro/non h)/nqoun ai(/ te tw=n filoso/fwn
kai\ r(hto/rwn diatribai/, *qeofra/stw| te sunege/neto
kai\ *dhmhtri/w| tw=| *falhrei=. eu)fuh\s de\ peri\ tou\s
politikou\s lo/gous geno/menos a)kmazo/ntwn e)/ti tw=n peri\ 
*dhmosqe/nhn h)/rcato lo/gous gra/fein kai\ proh/|ei kata\
mikro\n ei)s do/can. ma/lista de\ h)/kmase meta\ th\n *)aleca/ndrou
teleuth/n, *dhmosqe/nous me\n kai\ tw=n a)/llwn
r(hto/rwn fugai=s a)idi/ois kai\ qana/tois peripeso/ntwn,
ou)deno\s d' u(poleipome/nou met' au)tou\s a)ndro\s a)ci/ou 

lo/gou. kai\ diatete/leken e)tw=n pentekai/deka xro/non
lo/gous suggra/fwn toi=s boulome/nois, e(/ws *ka/ssandros
th\n po/lin kate/sxen. e)pi\ de\ *)anacikra/tous a)/rxontos,
e)f'  ou(= kate/lusan th\n e)n th=| *mounuxi/a| froura\n u(po\ 
*kassa/ndrou katastaqei=san oi( peri\ *)anti/gonon kai\
*dhmh/trion  basilei=s, ai)ti/an e)/xwn a(/ma toi=s e)pifanesta/tois
*)aqhnai/wn kai/toi ce/nos au)to\s w)\n katalu=sai
to\n dh=mon, o(rw=n h)reqisme/nous tou\s *)aqhnai/ous
kai\ ma/lista tw=| ploutei=n e(auto\n u(forwme/nous, mh\ dia\
tou=to pa/qh| ti deino/n, ei)selqei=n me\n ei)s dikasth/rion
ou)x u(pe/meinen, e)celqw\n de\ th=s po/lews kai\ e)lqw\n ei)s
*xalki/da th\n e)n *eu)boi/a|, to\n a)p' *)anacikra/tous xro/non
e(/ws *fili/ppou pentekaidekaeth= geno/menon e)kei= die/triyen,
ei)/ tis au)tw=| ge/noito dia\ *qeofra/stou kai\ tw=n

quote:
*dei/narxos *swstra/tou *kori/nqios
*proce/nw|, w(=| su/neimi, bla/bhs tala/ntwn du/o. e)/blaye/
me *pro/cenos, u(podeca/menos ei)s th\n oi)ki/an th\n e(autou= 
th\n e)n a)grw=|, o(/te pefeugw\s *)aqh/nhqen kath/|ein e)k
*xalki/dos, xrusi/ou me\n stath=ras o)gdoh/konta kai\ diakosi/ous
kai\ pe/nte, ou(\s e)ko/misa e)k *xalki/dos ei)do/tos
*proce/nou kai\ ei)sh=lqon e)/xwn ei)s th\n oi)ki/an au)tou=,
a)rgurw/mata de\ ou)k e)/latton ei)/kosi mnw=n a)/cia, e)pibouleu/sas 
tou/tois.

quote.#text:
tou= ga\r *)anacikra/tous a)/rxontos
eu)qu\ me\n h( tw=n *megare/wn po/lis e(a/lw: o( de\ *dhmh/trios 

o(  katelqw\n e)k tw=n *mega/rwn kateskeua/zeto
ta\ pro\s th\n *mounuxi/an kai\ ta\ tei/xh kataska/yas
a)pe/dwke tw=| dh/mw|. u(/steron de\ ei)shgge/lqhsan
polloi\  politw=n, e)n oi(=s kai\ *dhmh/trios o( *falhreu/s.
tw=n d' ei)saggelqe/ntwn ou(\s me\n ou)x u(pomei/nantas
th\n kri/sin e)qana/twsan th=|  yh/fw|, ou(\s d' u(pakou/santas 
a)kou/santas a)pe/lusan.

quote:
tou= d' e)niautou= toudi\ dielqo/ntos,
e(te/rou d' ei)sio/ntos, e)n a)kropo/lei shmei=on e)ge/neto
toiou=ton: ku/wn ei)s to\n th=s *polia/dos new\n ei)selqou=sa
kai\ du=sa ei)s to\ *pandro/seion, e)pi\ to\n bwmo\n a)naba=sa
tou= *(erkei/ou *dio\s to\n u(po\ th=| e)lai/a| kate/keito. pa/trion
d' e)sti\ toi=s *)aqhnai/ois, ku/na mh\ a)nabai/nein ei)s
a)kro/polin. peri\ to\n au)to\n de\ xro/non kai\ e)n tw=| ou)ranw=|
meq' h(me/ran h(li/ou t' e)ce/xontos kai\ ou)/shs ai)qri/as
a)sth\r e)pi/ tina xro/non e)ge/neto e)kfanh/s. h(mei=s d' e)rwthqe/ntes
u(pe/r te tou= shmei/ou kai\ tou= fanta/smatos,
ei)s o(\ fe/rei, fuga/dwn ka/qodon e)/famen proshmai/nein
a)mfo/tera kai\ tau/thn ou)k e)k metabolh=s pragma/twn
e)some/nhn, a)ll' e)n th=| kaqestw/sh| politei/a|: kai\ th\n kri/sin
e)pitelesqh=nai sune/bh.
p.#text:
a)/llwn fi/lwn ka/qodos, perime/nwn. sugxwrh/santos de\
 tou= basile/ws meta\  a)/llwn fuga/dwn ka)kei/nw|
katelqei=n, a)fiko/menos ei)s *)aqh/nas kai\ par' e(ni\ tw=n
fi/lwn *proce/nw| kataxqei\s  xrusi/on a)pollu/ei
ghraio\s w)\n h)/dh kai\ ta\s o)/yeis a)sqenh/s. o)ligw/rws d'
e)/xontos tou= *proce/nou pro\s th\n zh/thsin, di/khn  e)/laxen 
au)tw=| peri\ tw=n xrhma/twn au)to\s ou)depw/pote pro/teron
ei)s dikasth/rion parelqw/n. ou(=tos me\n o( bi/os
ta)ndro/s. a)podei/knutai d' e(/kaston au)tw=n e)/k te tw=n
i(storiw=n tw=n *filoxo/rou kai\ e)c w(=n au)to\s peri\ au)tou=

cune/grayen e)n tw=| lo/gw| tw=| kata\ *proce/nou, o(\s ei)/rhtai
me\n meta\ th\n fugh/n, proskeime/nhn de\ e)/xei th\n
grafh\n tau/thn:  ou) mh\n a)lla\ kai\ e)n au)tw=| tw=|
lo/gw| eu)qu\s me\n e)n a)rxh=| peri\ tou= mhdemi/an di/khn
pro/teron ei)selqei=n dedh/lwken, e)n de\ toi=s  
meta\ tau=ta prw=ton me\n e)n tw=| prooimi/w| th\n bla/bhn
th\n genome/nhn au)tw=| dia\ *proce/nou dedh/lwken, e)n de\ 
toi=s e(ch=s peri/ te th=s fugh=s kai\ tw=n a)/llwn diece/rxetai
pa/ntwn, e)c w(=n gi/gnetai fanera\ ta\ proeirhme/na,
kai\ e)/ti pro\s tou/tois, o(/ti ce/nos die/meine kai\ ge/rwn
h)/dh w)\n ei)=pe to\n lo/gon, e)c w)=n e)pi\ tw=| te/lei th=s di/khs ei)/rhke. 
tau=ta me\n au)to\s o( *dei/narxos peri\ e(autou=. *filo/xoros
de\ e)n tai=s *)attikai=s i(stori/ais peri/ te th=s fugh=s
tw=n katalusa/ntwn to\n dh=mon kai\ peri\ th=s kaqo/dou
pa/lin ou(/tws le/gei:  tau=ta me\n ou)=n th=s o)gdo/hs.
e)n de\ th=| e)na/th| fhsi/:

proeirhme/nwn dh\ tou/twn e(\n e)/ti lei/petai kai\ 
a)nagkaio/taton, th\n h(liki/an au)tou= diori/sai, i(/na kai\

peri\ tw=n lo/gwn tw=n te gnhsi/wn au)tou= kai\ mh\ safe/s
ti e)/xwmen le/gein. ti/qemen dh\ au)to\n e(bdomhkosto\n
e)/xonta e)/tos a)po\ th=s fugh=s katelhluqe/nai, w(s kai\
au)to/s fhsi, ge/ronta au(to\n a)pokalw=n: a)f' ou(= xro/nou
kai\ kalei=n tou\s e)n th=| h(liki/a| tau/th| ma/lista ei)w/qamen. 
u(pokeime/nwn de\ tou/twn o(losxerei= logismw=|  ei)/h a)\n kata\ *niko/fhmon a)/rxonta
gegonw/s. ei) de/ tis h)\ presbu/teron h)\ new/teron tw=n
ei)rhme/nwn xro/nwn au)to\n ei)=nai fh/sei, pro\s tw=| mhde\n
u(gie\s le/gein kai\ lo/gous au)= pollou\s a)felei=tai, ma=llon 
de\ pa/ntas plh\n pe/nte h)\ e(/c, tw=n me\n presbu/teron
au)to/n, tw=n de\ new/teron ei)=nai le/gwn. ou) mh\n a)lla\
kai\ a)/rcasqai le/gontes au)to\n lo/gous suggra/fein a)po\
tou= pe/mptou h)\ e(/ktou pro\s tw=| ei)kostw=| e)/tous ou)k a)\n
a(ma/rtoimen, a)/llws te kai\ tw=n peri\ *dhmosqe/nh to/te 
a)kmazo/ntwn. e(/ktos de\ kai\ ei)kosto/s e)stin a)po\ *nikofh/mou
*puqo/dhmos. w(/sq' o(/sous eu(ri/skomen presbute/rous
tou/tou tou= a)/rxontos  ei)/ tis gnhsi/ous qh/setai, a)pistoi/hmen a)\n
ei)ko/tws: e)/ti de\ kai\ tou\s a)p' *)anacikra/tous e(/ws *fili/ppou 
tetelesme/nous a)gw=nas o(moi/ws e)n toi=s yeude/sin
a)nagra/foimen a)/n: ou) ga\r ei)s *xalki/da a)/n tines e)/pleon
lo/gwn xa/rin h)\ i)di/wn h)\ dhmosi/wn: ou) ga\r te/leon h)po/roun
ou(/tw lo/gwn.

e)pei\ de\ o( xro/nos ta)ndro\s w(s oi(=o/n te a)kribe/stata
eu(/rhtai, pro\s o(\n kai\ tw=n lo/gwn tou/s te gnhsi/ous kai\
mh\ diakrinou=men, kairo\s h)/dh kai\ peri\ tou= xarakth=ros
au)tou= le/gein. e)/sti de\ duso/riston. ou)de\n ga\r ou)/te

koino\n ou)/t' i)/dion e)/sxen ou)/t' e)n toi=s i)di/ois ou)/t' e)n toi=s
dhmosi/ois a)gw=sin, a)lla\ kai\ toi=s *lusi/ou paraplh/sios
e)/stin o(/pou gi/netai kai\ toi=s *(uperei/dou kai\ toi=s *dhmosqe/nous
lo/gois. kai\ tou/twn polla\ a)/n tis e)/xoi paradei/gmata
 e)kqe/sqai. tou= me\n *lusiakou= xarakth=ros 
e)/n te tw=| peri\ *mnhsikle/ous lo/gw| kai\ e)n tw=| kata\ *lusikra/tous
u(pe\r *nikoma/xou kai\ e)n a)/llois polloi=s. tou=
d' *(upereidei/ou tai=s te oi)konomi/ais a)kribeste/rou kai\
tai=s kataskeuai=s gennaiote/rou pws o)/ntos tw=n *lusiakw=n
e)n plei/osi me\n h)\ tria/konta *deina/rxou lo/gois
paradei/gmata eu(rei=n e)/stin, ou)x h(/kista de\ kai\ e)n tw=|
peri\ th=s *)aga/qwnos diamarturi/as. ou) mh\n a)lla\ kai\
tou= *dhmosqenikou= xarakth=ros, o(\n ma/lista e)mimh/sato,
polu\ plei/w du/nait' a)/n tis ei)pei=n, a)/llws te kai\ e)n tw=|
kata\ *polueu/ktou. prooimia/zetai ga\r o(moi/ws e)kei/nw|,
kai\ di' o(/lou tou= lo/gou paraplh/sios meme/nhke.

pw=s ou)=n a)/n tis dunhqei/h tou\s gnhsi/ous au(tw=|
gnwri/zein lo/gous; prw=ton me\n ei) e)pi/staito tou\s tw=n
a)/llwn xarakth=ras, e)/peita tou\s me\n *lusi/ou paraplhsi/ous
lo/gous tou/tw| prosfe/roi, tou\s d' *(uperei/dou

do/cantas  ei)=nai/ tisi *deina/rxou le/goi makra\ tai=s e)pigrafai=s
tw=n bubli/wn xai/rein ei)pw/n, tou\s de\ tw=| *dhmosqenikw=|
xarakth=ri proselhluqo/tas w(s oi(=o/n te tou/tou
tou= a)ndro\s diabebaioi=to ei)=nai. e)pi\ me\n ga\r tw=n
a)/llwn r(hto/rwn, ou(/s memi/mhtai, megi/sth gnw=sis h( o(moei/deia 
tw=n lo/gwn. au)ti/ka o( me\n *lusi/as e)/n te toi=s
i)di/ois kai\ toi=s dhmosi/ois a)gw=sin au)to\s au(tw=| o(mologou/meno/s
e)stin  ei)s de\ to\n lektiko\n to/pon kata\
th\n tw=n o)noma/twn safh/neian kai\ su/nqesin au)tofuh=
me\n kai\ lei/an ei)=nai dokou=san, panto\s de\ lo/gou kata\ 
th\n h(donh\n diafe/rousan. o( d' *(uperei/dhs kata\ me\n
th\n e)klogh\n tw=n o)noma/twn h(tta=tai *lusi/ou, kata\ de\
to\n pragmatiko\n to/pon diafe/rei. dihgei=tai de\ pollaxw=s,
pote\ me\n kata\ fu/sin pote\ de\ a)po\ tou= te/lous
e)pi\ th\n a)rxh\n poreuo/menos. pistou=tai/  ou) kat' 
e)nqu/mhma mo/non, a)lla\ kai\ kat' e)pixei/rhma platu/nwn.
o( de\ tou/tous te kai\ tou\s a)/llous pa/ntas u(perballo/menos
*dhmosqe/nhs, a(/panta mimhsa/menos kai\ pa/ntwn
ta\ ka/llista e)kleca/menos, dh=los me\n kai\ th=| fwnh=| mo/non,
dh=los de\ kai\ tw=| kaq' e(/na e(/kaston lo/gon pre/ponti, 
ou) mh\n a)lla\ kai\  sunqe/sei kai\ tw=| tw=n
sxhmatismw=n a)gku/lw| kai\ th=| oi)konomi/a| kai\ tw=| pa/qei
kai\ to\ me/giston th=| deino/thti. o( de\ *dei/narxos ou)/te

o(/moios e)n a(/pasi/n e)stin ou)/t' i)di/ou tino\s eu(reth/s, di' ou(= gnw/setai/ tis au)to\n a)kribw=s, h)\ tou=ton to\n tro/pon:
polu\ ga\r e)mfai/nei mimh/seis te kai\ au)tw=n w(s pro\s tw=n
lo/gwn ta)rxe/tupon diafora/n, w(s kai\ e)pi\ tw=n *)isokra/tous
maqhtw=n kai\ au)tou= tou= *)isokra/tous.

p.quote: tau=ta ga\r me/gista e)kei/nou tou= a)ndro\s i)/dia/ e)stin
p.#text:
e)/stwsan dh/ tines e)pigrafo/menoi lo/goi w(s o)/ntes
*deina/rxou, pollh\n e)/xontes pro\s ta\ *lusiaka\ o(moio/thta.
tou/twn o( boulo/menos poiei=sqai th\n dia/gnwsin
prw=ton me\n th\n i)dio/thta tou= a)ndro\s e)kei/nou qewrei/tw,
e)/peit' e)a\n me\n a)reth/n te kai\ xa/rin toi=s lo/gois e)panqou=san
i)/dh| kai\ th\n tw=n o)noma/twn e)klogh\n e)nou=san 
kai\ to\ mhde\n a)/yuxon ei)=nai tw=n legome/nwn, qarrw=n
lege/tw tou/tous *lusi/ou. e)a\n de\ mh/te  xa/rien
o(/moion eu(ri/skh| mh/te to\ piqano\n kai\ to\ tw=n o)noma/twn
a)kribe\s mh/te  th=s a)lhqei/as a(pto/menon, e)n toi=s
*deina/rxou lo/gois au)tou\s e)a/tw. o(moi/ws kai\ e)pi\ tw=n
*(uperei/dou: e)a\n th=s me\n le/cews to\ i)sxuro/n, th=s de\
sunqe/sews to\ a(plou=n, tw=n de\ pragma/twn to\ eu)/kairon,
th=s de\ kataskeuh=s to\ mh\ tragiko\n mhde\ o)gkw=des e)/xh|
,
*(uperei/dou lege/tw. e)a\n de\ e)ndeeste/rws e)n au)toi=s tou/tois
e)/xh|, ka)\n ta\ a)/lla pa/nta mh\ fau/lws h)=| gegramme/na,
